display_c:
- Dolby Vision/HDR10 compliant
  - Wide color gamut display
  - 3D Touch display
  - True-tone display
sound_c:
- Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
  - Lightning to 3.5 mm headphone jack adapter
gps: Yes, with A-GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS
messaging: iMessage, SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email
features_c:
- Fast battery charging: 50% in 30 min
  - Qi wireless charging
  - Siri natural language commands and dictation
  - iCloud cloud service
  - MP3/WAV/AAX+/AIFF/Apple Lossless player
  - MP4/H.265 player
  - Audio/video/photo editor
  - Document editor
sensors: Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
body_c:
- IP67 certified - dust and water resistant
  - Water resistant up to 1 meter and 30 minutes
  - Apple Pay (Visa, MasterCard, AMEX certified)
primary_: Dual: 12 MP (f/1.8, 28mm) + 12 MP (f/2.4, 52mm), OIS, phase detection autofocus, 2x optical zoom, quad-LED dual-tone flash, check quality
speed: HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A (3CA) Cat12 600/150 Mbps, EV-DO Rev.A 3.1 Mbps
features: Geo-tagging, simultaneous 4K video and 8MP image recording, touch focus, face/smile detection, HDR (photo/panorama)
